# How to make GTA San Andreas look stunning with graphics mods
 
GTA San Andreas is one of the most popular and influential games in the GTA series, but it also has some outdated graphics compared to modern standards. Fortunately, there are many graphics mods that can enhance the visual quality of the game and make it look more realistic and immersive. Here are some of the best graphics mods for GTA San Andreas in 1080p resolution.
 
## Real HD Graphics Mod
 
This mod is a global reconfiguration of all effects, textures and shaders in the game. It adds new bump mapping for water and puddles, more realistic clouds, improved lighting and reflections, new depth of field, new bloom, new rain, stars, moon and noise textures, SweetFX for better smoothing and vignetting. This mod makes the game look more vibrant and detailed, as well as more cinematic. You can download it from [here](https://www.gtainside.com/en/sanandreas/mods/123900-real-hd-graphics/).
 
**DOWNLOAD ðŸ—¸ [https://ssurll.com/2uEm3V](https://ssurll.com/2uEm3V)**


 
## Insanity Vegetation Mod
 
This mod improves the graphics for the vegetation in the game. It makes the trees and grass look more realistic and natural, with better colors and shapes. The mod also adds more variety and density to the foliage, making the environment more lush and alive. You can download it from [here](https://www.gtainside.com/en/sanandreas/mods/118813-insanity-vegetation/).
 
## HD Weapons Mod
 
This mod replaces the old icons of weapons in the game with new HD versions. The mod also adds more details and reflections to the weapons, making them look more modern and shiny. The mod supports all weapons in the game, including melee weapons, firearms and explosives. You can download it from [here](https://www.gtainside.com/en/sanandreas/mods/100535-hd-weapons/).
 
## Cloud Skybox Mod
 
This mod enhances the appearance of clouds in the game. It makes the clouds look more feathery and dynamic, as well as more diverse depending on the weather and time of day. The mod also adds realistic sun rays and shadows to the clouds, creating a more atmospheric skybox. You can download it from [here](https://www.gtainside.com/en/sanandreas/mods/121392-cloud-skybox/).
 
## Ultimate Graphics Mod
 
This mod is a comprehensive overhaul of the graphics in the game. It improves the visuals of cars, characters, buildings, roads, water, sky and other textures in the game. It also adds new effects such as motion blur, lens flare, ambient occlusion, god rays, color correction and anti-aliasing. This mod makes the game look almost like a current-gen title, with stunning graphics and smooth performance. You can download it from [here](https://www.gtainside.com/en/sanandreas/mods/131982-ultimate-graphics-mod/).
 
With these graphics mods, you can enjoy GTA San Andreas in a whole new way. Just make sure you have a powerful PC that can handle these mods and follow the installation instructions carefully. Have fun!
